New Records: Sunil Chhetri is set to break the record of scoring at least one goal in his first, 25th, 50th, 75th, 100th and 125th match for the Blue Tigers with his 150th match.
Key Match Events: Sunil Chhetri is expected to play his 150th Senior International match against Afghanistan in Guwahati, Assam, on Tuesday, March 26, 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: AIFF President Mr. Kalyan Chaubey praised Chhetriâ€™s achievement saying it will go a long way in keeping the Indian football flag flying high.
Post-Match Reflections: AIFF Acting Secretary General Mr. M Satyanarayan said the All India Football Federation is proud to felicitate him on his 150th international match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sunil Chhetri has made 149 appearances for the National Team, netting a record 93 goals.
Others: Sunil Chhetri first donned the Senior National Team jersey on June 12, 2005, in a friendly match against Pakistan in Quetta.
